name: The fall (itch) (Alex)
description:
Its my first game in rpg maker called the fall

so basicly this is after a succsesful pacifist route and the whole sans aus and stuff

so the main character is Sam Gaster the child of Underfell Sans and Undertale Sans

The others are Lux and PJ who I gave there creators credit in the game

its just a bit of a demo a while im trying to find energy and not loose focus half way threw and thats why its rpg maker (ADHD/ADD am i right?)
